Method Detail

getBool

public static boolean getBool(Map options, String name, boolean defaultValue)
Gets the named boolean from the given map if present, otherwise the default value. Handles wrapped (Boolean) instances and converts "true" and "false" Strings to booleans
param:
options the Map containing the named entry
param:
name the entry name
param:
defaultValue the default if not present in options Map
return:
the boolean

getOptionsArgument

public static Map getOptionsArgument(def args, Map defaultOptions)
Get the options Map from the given argument array
param:
args the given array of arguments, may not be null, may be empty
param:
defaultOptions the default options, to be merged with user options, may be null
return:
a Map of options, never null

getOptionsArgument

public static Map getOptionsArgument(def args, Map defaultOptions, def overrideWithDefaultsIfNull)
Get the options Map from the given argument array
param:
args the given array of arguments, may not be null, may be empty
param:
defaultOptions the default options, to be merged with user options, may be null
param:
overrideWithDefaultsIfNull an array of keys which if null in the given options
are overriden with defaults
return:
a Map of options, never null

public static Object getQueryArgument(Object args)
Get the query argument - either a String or Closure
param:
args
return:
